The data engineer wants to establish a connection to the Presto engine on IBM watsonx.data. They search for the IBM watsonx.data Presto connector, and click Next, as shown in Figure 8-36. Figure 8-36 IBM watsonx.data Presto 6. The data engineer enters the configuration details, starting with the Connection overview window, as shown in Figure 8-37. Within the Connection overview window, they define the connection name and add a description. Figure 8-37 Connection overview Chapter 8.
